1553222.content: How about Itachi Uchiha,Sasuke's brother?

15532221.content: After you clicked "Yes",you were now greated by two choices:Two different of Itachi"Anbu" and "Akatsuki" You choose...
15532221.title: Yes

choices: You find Fugaku and Mikoto Uchiha instead
155322211.content:
You prefered Itachi's Anbu self over his Akatsuki self.His outfit was cooler and he was a normal innocent ninja at that time.You clicked the "Anbu" option.What came next was a "Are you sure? There is no turning back." message.He clicked yes.The computer shut down.You started to get nervous.Maybe that page contained a virus.It was a bad idea to click it.The computer screen opened once again but the screen was now a bright blue.A blue energy emerged and went toward you.It went through you.
As it happened,you started to feel pain through your entire body.First your eyes turned onyx black before to change into a red color with black tomoe.Your face hurt as the muscle and skin rearanged themselves,Your hair grew longer and turned black,forming a ponytail and bangs over your eyes and cheeks.You felt a dark fabric materialising on your forehead.You touched it,and felt a hard metalic plate over it:A ninja headband.
Your body went through the same process:Your bones and your muscles changed.

Your jeans,shirts and shoes were now replaced by black pants,a black shirt with a large collar,a silver armor/like vest,armbands,kunai holster on your left leg,shurkien pouch and Anbu weasel mask on your newly materialised belt.
When the pain ended you looked at your new self."Did...did I really turned into Itachi?" you asked yourself,only to noticed that your voice had changed.You even sounded like him.
You stared at your computer screen,which showed a new message:
"Congratulations:You have now transformed into Itachi Uchiha,Anbu,From "Naruto" Let us warn you that the changes are perminent,so you will have to live the rest of your life in your new form.
"Thank you for using animemorph.net."
The screen turned back to normal once again.
You decide to go downstairs and talk to your parents about this.when you arrive in the kitchen..
155322211.title: Anbu

155322221.content: The link leads you to two choices:Part 1 young Sasuke and Part 2 Sasuke(Shippuden).You click on...
155322221.title: Yes

choices: One of your teamates from Team 7
1553222211.content:
You click on part 1 Sasuke.You are greeted with the picture of Sasuke of Sasuke as a Genin,along with "Yes" and "No" buttons.You click on "Yes".
A message appears,saying "Are you sure? Once your choice is done there is not turning back."
"What does it mean by that?" you asked.You dismmised it and clicked on "Yes" anyway.
The computer first shut down.You started to panic,thinking it was a virus,until the screen activated again,in a blue light.A burst of energy came out of the computer and hits you.
You could feel pain as your entire body started to change and de-aged a few years.
Your skin tone went a tad paler.You could feel your bones and muscles moving and changing.You even started to feel something growing Inside your body,and an unknown energy flowing from it.
The pain reached your face as it changed,Black patches appeared in your hair and spread,while your hair style changed as well.You now had spiky ebony hair with shoulder length black bangs.Your clothes were the last part to change.Your shirt was replaced by a blue shirt with the Uchiha clan symbol on the back and a large collar.Your pants were replaced by white shorts and white and blue leggings.White and blue armbands were now around your arms and you could suttently feel cold metal as a ninja headband of Konoha appeared on your forehead.
As the pain stopped,you looked at the screen.
"The transformation is complete.Note that this change will be permenent.Thank you for using Animemorph.com!"
"What...what just happened?" you said,only to notice that your voice had changed.Not only that,but it was familliar.You searched for a Mirror and found one on the desk.You were shock of what was staring back at you.It wasn't your reflection,but the one of a character that,until now,was a fictional.You were now a 12 year old Sasuke Uchiha,from Naruto."Did...I turn into Sasuke?" you asked.You hear someone calling you from downstairs.You decided to see who it was,despite not wanting to be seen as Sasuke.You could always say that it's a cosplay.When you arrive downstairs,you meet...
1553222211.title: Part 1 Sasuke

choices: Yes you should, because it's fracking Luffy!
Nah, there are other options.  You got all day.
1553322222221.content:
"FINALLY!" you say. "A show I like!"

And so you scroll through some options and see Luffy from One Piece. "Huh..." You think, "I wonder if I should be Luffy..."
1553322222221.title: One Piece

choices: Convince your parents of the situation.
Bust this joint, since you're a pirate now!  ARGH!!
15533222222211.content:
"Luffy, eh?" You say to yourself. "Sounds good enough for me." You then click yes.

At first, nothing happens. "Well that was a waste of time." You say. Suddenly, though, you feel weird. "Ooo, spoke too soon." Sure enough, your body begins to start changing. At first, there's immense pain, but then, pleasure. You feel your hair become shaggier, since you usually spend time grooming it otherwise. You feel a change under your left eye, as if it were a stitch.

"No biggie." You tell yourself. But then, things get weird. You feel your entire body start to transform into rubber, of all things. No, I'm not making this up.

"Good God, I need to rest..." You say, on the verge of passing out. And so, you pass out on your bed.

When you wake up, you don't feel too different, just rubbery. "Is that all?" You say, and then stop. "Wait... I got the Funimation voice?!" Sure enough, you do. "Wait, does that mean...?" You rush to your bathroom and look at yourself on the mirror. You do not see Tom Sawyer Briggs. You see Monkey D. Luffy instead. That means you are now Monkey D. Luffy. "HOW DID THAT WORK?!?" You yell, surprised at how hot blooded that sounded.

"Okay... Calm down Tom-I mean, Luffy..." you console yourself, "just think about what you're going to do."

Calming down, you decide to:
15533222222211.title: Monkey D. Luffy, Because Why Not?

choices: They are sitting down at the table.
155332222222111.content:
"I should probably let my mom and dad know." You say. Just as you're about to grab different clothes, you realize, "Wait... I have a red vest, blue shorts, and this straw hat. I think that should be enough."

You then resume down stairs to meet your parents.
155332222222111.title: Parents Understand, Right?

1553322222221111.content:
When you get there, though, they aren't home. "Figures." You say. You then read the note. Hey Luffy, you read. "Wait, what?" You say, before continuing. Considering how passed out we all were from the party, I decided to write this letter, captain, so that we'd actually get somewhere. From, Nami.

"No friggin way..." You think. "Wait, does that mean...?" You run out, and see that you're on a plainish island, with similar plain buildings nearby. You walk around until you decide to ask for help.

And so, you find a blonde guy. "Hey, dude, do you know where a really big ship is?" He turns around and reveals to be Sanji, before replying, "Wow, Luffy, really? Were you wasted <i>that</i> hard?"

Of course you replied, "Really, I just woke up a new man." Your stomach grumbles. "And I need my meat, too."

Sanji sighs.
1553322222221111.title: From A Note To Sanji

15533222222212.content: "Maybe I should become Nami?"
15533222222212.title: Maybe Nami

155332222222221.content: So who shall it be? Perhaps one of the Elric brothers?
155332222222221.title: Fullmetal Alchemist

choices: Find your parents and try to convince them of what happened to you
1553322222222211.content:
You had been watching FMA for the past year . You had finished both series and watched both the movies .While watching the first episode again , because you were bored . An advertisement for a site called Animemorph.net . It said you'll never see your favorite anime characters the same way again . A fellow anime fan that you frequently talk to via email had heard of it. He said not to go there , it was dangerous . He was probably trying to trick you though. Like when he said that Death Note was about musical notes that kill you. You clicked the tab and looked at the page . It was just an image sharing site . A but load of anime computer wallpaper was there . You found a cool one of Edward from FMA and clicked view image .

Words appeared on the screen it was a question . "Is this your choice?" you clicked yes . "Are you sure? You will not be able to chose another." you clicked yes. The screen started to glow with an intense light , you were blind for a few seconds . Your vision cleared and you felt sick . You shut the computer off and went to bed . As you lie in bed you couldn't sleep . You tossed and turned , the feeling starting to become an intense pain . You screamed into your pillow , then once you were done screaming flipped over . Your had looked different , but you were unable to stay awake . You fainted , you eventually woke up . You placed your hand on your head and heard an unfamiliar sound . It sounded metalic , like metal clanking together . Your hand was cold as ice . You moved your had off your face and sat up . Something was wrong , your clothes which had fit perfectly . Were now lose as heck . You jumped off your bed and looked in the mirror . Your mouth dropped . You did stare back at you . Edward Elric however did . You stood there in shock , what shall you do now?
1553322222222211.title: Edward

15533222222222221.content:
You decided to check the Black Butler section.You did start to read the manga a few years ago,but only started to Watch the anime when season 3,"Book of Circus " was released.You heard from your friend about the first season being 20% canon and the rest filler and season 2 being nothing but filler,with Ciel *Spoiler* turning into a demon at the end*end of spoiler*
You were now greeted by a selection of pictures with characters from the manga on it.
Which one will you choose?
15533222222222221.title: Yes,why not.

155332222222222211.content:
"Let's go with Sébastian then." The demonic butler was your most favorite character from the series.You clicked on his picture and were now greeted by a text window saying"Are you sure about this choice? There is no turning back." You looked confused but dismissed the warning and clicked "Yes."
The computer crashed soon after you clicked.
You started to panic.It wasn't a good idea.Now your computer was inffected by a virus...or so you thought.The computer activated again ,but the screen was red.
"I take it you are my new host?" asked a male voice with a british acent.A familiar one too."You'll do.Now,let's get started,shall we?"
A dark energy emerged from the computer and surounded you...before to go through you.You cried in pain as it went Inside your body.
Once it was over,the pain didn't stop,it implifided.Your bones cracked and your muscles rearanged themselves.You grew taller,your skin turned paler and your face changed.Your eyes turned from green to red.Your hair grew and turned black as the night.Your clothing wasn't spared either,your jeans turned into black pants,your sneakers slowly turned into elegent raven colored shoes and instead of wearing your t-shirt,you were now wearing a white shirt,grey vest and a familiar black swalowed tailed coat. with a silver pin with a familiar emblem on it.When the transformation stopped,and the pain ended,you looked at your new self.
"Goodness...I din't know this program could do that." you said,only to notice that your voice had also changed..with a british accent."I'm Sébastian now..." you said,before to smile."It might be fun." You turned to the computer screen and noticed a message.
"You are now transformed.Please take note that this form is perminent.THank you for choosing animemorph.net."
When you were done reading,you heard a familiar voice calling you fron downstairs.
"Sébastian!
You sighed. and looked at your new Pocket Watch."Already?" You putted it back on your coat's Pocket.
"No time to waste then.So much work to do."
You headed downstairs to meet with...
155332222222222211.title: Maybe Sebastian?

info.brief_description: this is my version of animemorph.com
info.description: like in the breif description the main character is tom 15 years old he loves anime. feel free to add new characters plus make sure you have a picture of the character. no killing and use small cussing. update 6/19/14, Excuse me for my old rage I was still a novice I'm sorry for being a jerk about my typing.
